fields.description: {{Table.fromStruct}} is not listed in externs, so its obfuscated by the closure compiler

comments.body:
TheNeuralBit opened a new pull request #1808: ARROW-2327: [JS] Table.fromStruct missing from externs
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1808
 
 
   Add `Table.fromStruct` to unit tests, and add it to externs to make the test pass
